website_summaries.verdict: The easiest and safest way to travel with your entire system.
pros: Easily fit your entire system, dock and all into this RDS case
The interior pockets are sized specifically for each switch component
Items fit snug and secure, with some room left over for extra accessories
The exterior is hard and sturdy, while inside remains cushioned and soft
Includes 2 plastic game cases and 2 SD cases
The red and white threading along the zipper is a nice design touch
cons: The case has a strong chemical smell, and needs to be aired out for a while

customer_reviews.title: Good design, cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: Initially I really liked this product, I am frequently in the hospital so this was a great way to bring my switch so I could hook it up to the TVs. Unfortunately the handle broke so I cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kayne Lermitte

customer_reviews.title: Handle Breaks
customer_reviews.text: Handle broke on second use. The case is well designed as it holds everything nicely, however the strap broke and it happened while boarding a flight . Very disappointed as it can no longer serve as a carrying case. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LeeC

customer_reviews.title: Buyers remorse for my handle-less Switch case
customer_reviews.text: I've had this case for about a week. I can fit everything I want to in it but some of the items are a bit awkward and I think the way I positioned it made one of my spare joycons die. The handle broke the third time I picked the thing up. If I'm going to pay premium prices for Nintendo licensed gear I have an expectation of quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: GiChewy

customer_reviews.title: Smells, but functional!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to put both a charging grip (with two joy-cons attached), and the regular joy-con grip inside the case. I had to add something to the bottom of the middle back slot, to raise up the grip so that the buttons on the joy-cons wouldn't turn on. Also, it really does stink! I tried baking soda and carbon filters....still stinks. I like that the case is compact, but I wish there was a little more space or an outer pocket for cables.
customer_reviews.author: hshaw

customer_reviews.title: Carrying strap breaks easily.
customer_reviews.text: In general, this is awesomely designed to fit my switch and all accessories. However, after a few uses (I've had it a month and half), the carrying strap started to come apart on both sides. Maybe I got unlucky with a faulty strap. I will still use it though, but I wouldn't say top-notch quality.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kinne

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk!!!!
customer_reviews.text: well, I ordered this after Christmas for my Nintendo Switch and don't use it too often, just to transport from point A to point B. Six months later and it has completely become useless! First the Handle broke and two days ago, the Zipper broke. Terrible quality, DONT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great Case that holds everything you need!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case for Nintendo Enthusiasts. I’m able to fit in this case the Nintendo Switch, the dock (and connections), a pro controller, 2 sets of Joy-con Controllers, and whatever games I might bring with me. This case will hold everything you need! It’s also great quality, and keeps everything in place during transit.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Gargano

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement. This does not hold the pro controller at all
customer_reviews.text: First of all this case smells disgusting. It’s not a new product smell at all. It smells like some smoked a cheap cigar and left it burning inside the case for a week. The switch itself fits snuggly enough but there’s still a chance it can come out and move around. The pro controller does not fit snuggly AT ALL which was my sole reason for purchasing this at all. You put it in the slot made for the controller and it bounces around the case. This is not worth your money people. Trust me.
customer_reviews.author: Busterwolf3

customer_reviews.title: Worst experience BE CAREFUL
customer_reviews.text: People it’s been my worst experience on Amazon This seller just sent me this product 😓 It smells so bad and as u can see it looks like burned (some glue around) inside some garbage and extremely damaged for $40 Be careful - I saw on the pics the switch logo but what I got it’s totally different Don’t buy here
customer_reviews.author: Hanzel Esteban Castro Solano

customer_reviews.title: Great case, tiny handle?
customer_reviews.text: I love the material for this case. It's definitely worth it if you plan on putting away your Switch. Not so great in how it looks when you carry it. It's big and bulky. It might've been better if they somehow added another way of holding it besides the little handle. Perhaps incorporated a strap or something? Either way, still a great case.
customer_reviews.author: PACHINK0S

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell to it
customer_reviews.text: The case is good and fits/carries everything I need for my switch. The only reason I am not giving 5 stars is cause when we got it, it smelled SO horrible. Like cigarette smoke. I have tried everything possible and the smoke smell will not go away at all! I bought his case because we we were going on a trip and now our switch smells like the cigarette smoke scent the case had. Wish I could return it cause of this bad smell but it already opened it and threw out the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Francis S.

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad case till something happens to it.
customer_reviews.text: At first I was very excited about this case, it is very structurally sound and difficult to bend. Everything fits in it well, the only problem came when the zipper mechanic snagged upon itself and wouldn’t close properly. I went ahead and returned because I went back to my smaller case. For the most part the case seemed well made except it can have issues on the closing mechanism
customer_reviews.author: Leo Lion

customer_reviews.title: All-in-One System Storage
customer_reviews.text: The case is very well-made, sturdy and easily fits all Switch components including the base and I always squeeze extra stuff in there with no problem. The moulded interior is perfect for safe storage and fits the Switch components snuggly for added security. The case is light but solid. Super portable. If you plan on taking your base, system, games, and a pro controller along, you need this travel case. It’s also a very attractive item with the Black and red trim as well as small Switch logo zipper pull.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Swain

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate Nintendo Switch Travel Case!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best cases I've had for a console. At max capacity, I've found that it can hold: Nintendo Switch console with 2 joy-cons attached Dock Power Supply Joy con grip Joy con grip with 2 joy cons attached Pro controller Pouch (with game case, pro controller charge cable, and 4 joy-con wrist straps) The only complaint is the funky plastic smell. I feel that it will go away on its own by airing it out or with the use of a cleaning product.
customer_reviews.author: Monkey

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Everything fits snuggly which I really like. I bought it 'used' but when it arrived all that seemed used about it was a mangled cardboard slip, the case looks brand new (and smells like it). If there's one complaint it's that this really has a pungent offensive smell. I don't know if it was because of the way it was stored beforehand or if it's just that 'new case smell'. I'm sure that after some use it'll dissipate... I hope. The handle does seem kinda flimsy but I bought the case more to protect my Switch during storage than to really travel with it.
customer_reviews.author: s34w33d

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: It has a funky smell for some reason. Also, all the stuff doesn’t fit quite right. It fits, it just seams like this case was designed for a very specific purpose and everything should fit perfectly. But it just doesn’t. I wish I would have researched some more before buying this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Holding strap broke on 3rd use of carrying case
customer_reviews.text: The carrying case was awesome the first two times I used it to move my switch to my friend's houses. But on the third use, the strap that you hold when carrying it around completely broke on one side, making it impossible to carry with. VERY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Bring All Your Nintendo Switch Accessories With You
customer_reviews.text: The Nintendo Switch traveler deluxe case is well worth the purchase if you plan on traveling with your Switch. This case is not made for the Switch itself. I recommend purchasing this if you move around and need to bring all accessories with you, including the dock and cords. The one main product issue I have is the smell of the case. I have left it unzipped to air out, but it does not fix it. That's the only reason I cannot give the product a 5 star ratting.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Mayberry

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: It holds the dock, switch, wrist straps, and joy con grip pretty well. Although, I put my wrist straps and game card holders in the little pouch it comes with and I had my joy con grip and switch in it and I couldn’t find any room for the wires I ended up just throwing them on top. So it’s nice that it’s namebrand but it’s a little small especially if you also have a pro controller and you want the joy con grip in it too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very High quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I immediately bought this case when I first got my nintendo switch. I've had it for a year now and the case is really amazing. It has good quality. It comes with a pouch for my nintendo switch charger. The insides are very sturdy my controllers and wires are not shaking inside when being carried. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ezekiel

customer_reviews.title: Update: This case is great
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write an updated review until I actually use the case. I received the replacement shipment and all the accessories were inside. I just got around to using this a couple of weeks ago and it’s awesome. I packed my entire Switch in here with games and a couple extras with no issues. Great travel case for anyone who has a Switch and is wanting to take the entire system with them on vacation or road trips.
customer_reviews.author: Leiann Heinrich

customer_reviews.title: Little bulky but it works
customer_reviews.text: Little bit bulky, but it works. Only thing I didn't like is that it doesn't leave a whole lot of room if you're trying to add in more than one pro controller. Other than that, I was able to fit my switch, charger, and even 1-2 amiibos. Protective case seems to be sturdy enough to handle a drop or two but I still would not chance it. Padding on the inside feels like it can absorb most impacts.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Wong

customer_reviews.title: Good protection, afordable.
customer_reviews.text: Nice strong durable product. But it is large, so be prepared to take it as a lunch bag. Not suitable for traveling if you are not using a car. Unless you prefer to have a massive box in your carry on bag. Despite that, I like it because I can basically have everything with the switch in one place. Comes with some cases so you can have your memory cards or addional game cartridges.
customer_reviews.author: Juan U.

customer_reviews.title: Handle pulls loose from the stitching easily.  Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: The interior of the case is fine, but the strap came off after using it only a few times. I bought it a while ago, but only pull it out of the closet when I travel. On the 3rd or 4th trip with the case, the handle pulled completely out of the stitching. From looking at the reviews, this is not an isolated incident. I advise you look for a more durable solution.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M.

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: Nervous to purchase because of the reviews that said the handle breaks easily. I’ve had mine for 2-3 months and it’s still going strong. We took it on a long road trip so it was convenient to carry all the components without losing anything.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Worth it to get the bigger case
customer_reviews.text: Bought this case because it can easily hold my Switch, extra joy-cons, Pro Controller, joy-con grip, power cable, and HDMI cables without crowding everything together. It's worth it to pay extra to protect hundreds of dollars in equipment when you need to travel with it. I also comes with a bag and two cartridge holders to hold up to 8 games. That also fits easily into the case too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R

customer_reviews.title: It does the job well enough
customer_reviews.text: It’s a well built product, but I wish it had taken inspiration from other similarly made products with a large insert at the top for storing more games and cables, with this being a licensed Nintendo product and all. This one only provides a small, single pouch that’s supposed to hold the HDMI cable, the joy con straps, AND the two game cases which only hold around 6 games (8 if you don’t need the SD card holders). Because of that, this feels like a knockoff Nintendo product as opposed to an official one, imo. At least this one has the switch logo on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Great for Everyday Use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my sister who loves her Nintendo Switch. She said she needed a case and this was the one I got her for her birthday. After two months of using it every day, she says she loves it and it was exactly what she was looking for. It keeps her system and games safe while on the go, never needing to worry if anything will get damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Chwalik

customer_reviews.title: Only securely fits original switch package ideams
customer_reviews.text: It perfectly fits all the originally purchased set. Although the pro remote "fits" it is not secure and protected. We use it just for going back and forth from mom's to dad's house so it is definitely better protection for most things than throwing then in a backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Appropriate protective case for Switch system components
customer_reviews.text: I really like how this case protects components while we are traveling as a family and it has worked great for that purpose. The only couple of things I would change are to make the pro controller area at the top section a bit more snug. The pro controller wobbles in there quite a bit, but I think the slot still serves its purpose. Allowing more space on the left side for the cables bag would be appreciated, so that it can double as a place to put the joy con charging grip and additional controllers. It is just slightly too small. So that grip still has to stay out of the case.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Isaacs

customer_reviews.title: Switch case
customer_reviews.text: Fits the switch, the base, three joy con grips, the cartridge carrier, and the cords easily. Wished the top part would have had a net to hold the cords more elegantly but it works well regardless. I like the aesthetics of the case, fits the switch motif. The little switch logo for a zipper is a nice touch. All in all I would say I'm very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: The handle broke after 1.5 months/4 uses
customer_reviews.text: Love this carry case for my switch and had used it on three separate occasions to transport my system to another house. However, as a comment on design, the case does not have a clear or easy store for the cords- a simple mesh bag on the top half would solve this. AND It broke 1.5 months after purchase (on my 4th use) simply by picking it up by the handle from a coffee table. The handle snapped clean off on one end causing me to drop the entire system. Fortunately because it's well padded I dont suspect any damage to my system but now I have a case with no handle.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Terrible chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: The layout and construction is fine, but it has a VERY strong chemical smell. I am trying to use carpet cleaner to get rid of the smell. It is unbearable.
customer_reviews.author: stonerdrummer

customer_reviews.title: Switch it up
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Holds EVERYTHING! Switch, games, memory cards, controllers, dock, and more. The case is solid enough too that I'm confident everything is safe under normal conditions. It is large, so you wouldn't want to be toting this around all day if you carry your switch, but its great for storage, and general organization.
customer_reviews.author: MongoMike

customer_reviews.title: Hard shell - fits everything!
customer_reviews.text: This case fits the gaming console as well as the charging station for an easily portable solution! The case does not look massive by any means and looks sleek and not overtly obvious of what it’s carrying. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: corbey

customer_reviews.title: Wish there were somehow more space for controllers
customer_reviews.text: You can easily store 2 joycons and one other controller in the case. I'm not a design engineer, but I'd like to have been able to store more pro controllers in this case considering how bulky the product is. It's a little bit of a hassle every time I pack up the Switch with its joycons, my pro controller, the dock, the cables and the joycon frame.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymeson Pon

customer_reviews.title: It's a switch case!
customer_reviews.text: Great case to hold, travel with and protect the Nintendo switch. Holds the parts that came with the switch, nothing more. If u travel and use the docking station it's recommended for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Bucci Jr.

customer_reviews.title: The inside has very good quality. Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: The inside has very good quality. Unfortunately, the handle didn't had such quality and it broke the very first time we used it. Because of this, the zipper came out as well. So now, we can't close it.
customer_reviews.author: Luís Jeronimo Aleixo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and provides great protection
customer_reviews.text: Product came exactly as advertised and provided with great protective barriers for my Switch. Really light and sizable to carry around without issues. I definitely recommend for your Switch.
customer_reviews.author: MyN. L.

customer_reviews.title: a must have for Nintendo switch owners
customer_reviews.text: what a huge bag for saving Nintendo switch from dust and keep it away children plus it help you with take switch with you in any place or even take it with you in your travels, the design of the inside help you with arrange everything with its place, and im cery satisfied with what i get
customer_reviews.author: SALEH Mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Best Switch case I've seen
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful bag for the Switch. It's big enough to hold all the important parts and has the perfect balance of a soft, flexible interior with a harder casing to make sure your Switch is secure while traveling. I was very happy with the purchase as it met all of my expectations and even had a few features I didn't expect.
customer_reviews.author: JRSmith

customer_reviews.title: wouldn’t buy it again
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good case and very well organized but I wouldn’t buy it again. Ordered this right when the switch can out and there were only 2 options for cases. There is not space for any more than 2 sets of Joy-Cons. We have multiple Pro wireless controllers and have to carry they separately.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: must have for switch
customer_reviews.text: this thing is great holds all his games and system console with room for my pro controller.. well worth it if you take your switch on the road..
customer_reviews.author: LaMont

customer_reviews.title: Seemed nice...until it fell apart
customer_reviews.text: This seemed like a really nice case when it arrived, however, the threading on the handle came apart in less than 3 days of use and then the zipper fell off, making the case completely useless. So disappointed and for the price, I expected a LOT more use and better quality for a Nintendo-branded item. This is just pure junk.
customer_reviews.author: JLR317

customer_reviews.title: Makes the switch even more portable!
customer_reviews.text: I got this system case because i had been taking my whole switch system with me when I would travel to visit friends. This makes the system even more portable because then I can take the dock and everything needed for my Nintendo switch with me. I would recommend this case to anyone who travels with their whole system.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. ODonnell

customer_reviews.title: Great complete travel case
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case if you're always on the go like I am. It fits your dock, cables, switch, and your joy con grip (or controller). If you're kid is going to be travelling between family members homes or taking it to a friends house, this is the case for you. The only con I have about this case is the switch sits right on the bottom of the case if you're holding it by the handle. If you were to drop it, the switch would be the first thing to land screen side down but the case should protect it from the impact. I would recommend it to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Krousemouse

customer_reviews.title: Everything has a perfect snug fit!!!
customer_reviews.text: This case fit like a snug glove. Not really how I want my gloves to fit, but its exactly how I wanted my devices to fit. Nothing falls out or slinks over on the next thing, but then what do you expect. It's a genuine Nintendo case. How can you go wrong?
customer_reviews.author: V. Young

customer_reviews.title: Bought As A Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for a friend of mine and he's still talking about how useful it is. It's overall quality is what you expect from a "Nintendo Brand", very good. It has plenty of room and spots for everything my buddy has with his Switch
customer_reviews.author: Michael Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was a little bigger but it fits the basic things!
customer_reviews.author: bradlee miller

customer_reviews.title: Oversized but does the trick
customer_reviews.text: Great carrying case, but also over dimensioned unless you have literally every single accessory in the market. When I flew home from Europe I actually packed a couple of t shirts inside it just to not waste space.
customer_reviews.author: Viktor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case for a Switch
customer_reviews.text: Need to carry a switch, controllers, and more? This is a high quality bag that will carry the entire system and lots of extra doodads as well. Costs a little more than some of the others I considered, but the quality and interior space is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian O Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best all-storage travel case for my brother's Switch!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect case for my brother's Switch. I just wanted a place to store it without it getting messy or looking bad. Taking it elsewhere, like my cousin's or aunt's place, will be nice and easy too. Nothing moving around or getting hit hard!
customer_reviews.author: Red Mountains

customer_reviews.title: Inside my case is reversed
customer_reviews.text: You know what's funny, the inside of my case is reversed. The switch is placed actually at the top in my case which allows the switch to fall out the holder. Weird I know, clearly some type of Chinese manufacturing mix up
customer_reviews.author: trintendo

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: I received my deluxe system case today. I am missing the 2 red cases for games and Sd cards. I can’t return it because I need it for vacation and won’t get a replacement before we leave. Very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: kristine prue

customer_reviews.title: Fits everything and keeps the switch safe
customer_reviews.text: I really love RDS products, I have only purchased RDS products for my NES and SNES mini consoles and they have been great. The RDS Switch Carrying Case is no different. I feel great know that my Switch is safe.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Durable product (does have a smell, but air it out and it's fine!)
customer_reviews.text: Got this at Christmas. We regularly take it around with us when we travel, go to work, to friends' houses. The Switch always stays inside of it with all of its accessories and it gets moved around quite a bit. As other reviewers noted, it did have a rather nasty smell to it when it first came out of the box. Once aired out though, it was fine. None of the zippers or tags have broken and it's holding up strong so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Case
customer_reviews.text: I take my Nintendo Switch to work with me and this is the perfect thing to keep it protected. Plus, it has extra room if I need to bring additional cords or joy-cons.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey L.

customer_reviews.title: Smelled absolutely terrible! But it works well.
customer_reviews.text: We had to air the product out for several days because of a foul odor coming from it. It smelled like strong chemicals. But I will say everything fit very well and it's the best case on the market. Just stinky at first.
customer_reviews.author: Hallibu

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I moved out of state and bought this for my switch and it works wonderfully. Easy to fit every part and also any extra equipment. Study too and great for future travels.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Great Size and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Fits so many accessories! I love this case for traveling, it’s compact and has great fitting slots for each gaming accessory. Nothing rattles around when holding this case on it’s side. It’s smaller than my toiletries bag, so I’d say it’s a great size for traveling, considering how much it fits!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth Bayarena

customer_reviews.title: Holds What It Needs To
customer_reviews.text: This is a neat case that holds all of the basic Switch equipment. Instead of a pro controller, I put in my wired controller, and it fits perfectly. I picked this case to match the NES classic case, so it was more an aesthetic choice. This will be used more for storage rather than travel.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon G

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased my Switch before going on a business trip. This wasn’t sold at Best Buy so I had to order on Amazon. This thing is great. I put all my stuff in it and put it in my backpack. Solid build and looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Corsei

customer_reviews.title: Great case! Fits everything I need to for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great case! Fits everything I need to for the Switch. If I had to complain about something, there isn't a particular component to fit the extra cables nicely, so I do have to leave them somewhat loose in the main compartment.
customer_reviews.author: ElementUser

customer_reviews.title: This case is great! I really do adore it
customer_reviews.text: This case is great! I really do adore it, and it keeps my Switch system perfectly safe. If you're like me, you probably don't have a screen protector on your console - worry not! The spot your switch slips in does not scratch the screen - just dust it out beforehand and it'll be dandy! In personal taste, I'd prefer that the cord bag was a different material - I'm not a fan of the thick mesh. The ability to hold two pro controllers or two sets of joy-cons (+ the pair on the Switch) would be something I'd like, too.
customer_reviews.author: whoopsydaizy

customer_reviews.title: Really durable feel, except the handle strap
customer_reviews.text: The carrying case and all feels really sturdy and good quality, only thing is the handle strap. I've heard reviews that it may snap. And I can say that it does feel way too thin for what it is carrying. Overall tho everything fits inside of it for my Switch
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking Case however after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking Case however after 4 months, the strap broke! It’s not like we carry it around all that much. Now my window of return is closed ... not happy
customer_reviews.author: WELLINGTONLAXMOM

customer_reviews.title: Convenience at its best
customer_reviews.text: I was completely satisfied with my product. It is very convenient to have your entire Nintendo Switch console in one place and know that nothing would be scratched when it comes to travelling. I read reviews about strong industrial smell, but this was not the case for me. Loved the game card cases and the little pouch that came with. Totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This will work great for traveling. -1 Star bc man does it smell lol I have it open when not in use
customer_reviews.author: Mikee

customer_reviews.title: Mario Approved case!
customer_reviews.text: This case is amazing if you plan on transporting the entire Switch Unit together. It will only fit what the original Switch comes with so getting another pro controller to fit inside is a challenge. It does fit everything super snug and safe!
customer_reviews.author: RatherDashing

customer_reviews.title: Good case, but smells like cigarettes
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly to fit my needs. The only problem I have with this product, is that when I received this item (brand new, straight from Amazon Prime) it smelled strait up like cigarett smoke. I hope this smell eventually subsides from the case. I would return and ask for one that doesnt smell like that but I don’t want to go through the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Lafflin

customer_reviews.title: Don't forget this.
customer_reviews.text: I planned ahead and got this for my sons Switch. So glad I did because I didn't want him putting his device in his backpack. This is very durable and the things inside dont move around when you carry it. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Super Poor Quailty- Broke in 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: Super low quality. Handle broke after 3 months of moderately low use. Then zipper broke a week later. Completely unusable now. Poor quality do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: A must have for switch owners
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my kids because they love to bring the switch everywhere we go. Very sturdy and well made- I dont have to worry about it getting broken when it is In this case.
customer_reviews.author: Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for Christmas and he love it. Just the right size for all his stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt DeJonge

customer_reviews.title: Great case - A little wiggle in the top slot
customer_reviews.text: Great case, holds a lot. I put my switch system in there as well as my ps vita and accessories in there as well. There is a little extra room in the top slot, but it’s not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Its great but it smells like burnt trash!
customer_reviews.text: I like it but that smell! Wtf is up with the burnt trash smell? Holds my gear great, haven't had handle break,yet.....been using it a hard week and feel good about it.
customer_reviews.author: luckyhimself

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey, but really awesome for travel, display, and organization! I like it for its versatility
customer_reviews.text: Really liking this case! When I'm not using it for traveling (which I honestly rarely do) I use it as a display! Everything is really well organized, there's different slots to organize everything!
customer_reviews.author: Uuugggggghhh

customer_reviews.title: Spacious
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. Not quite big enough for all my stuff, but does the trick for a short trip. Holds the Switch, extra controller, one charger, games. I have a car charger that I just got in it also
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy case.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Used it for the first time a month ago on a flight and it’s so easy. TSA wants the device separate so all I had to do was open it up and it’s clean. No hassle. Brought it back home and had a blast with my family.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Lai

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Great case. It holds everything and more! Securely and snuggly, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: budiw

customer_reviews.title: The fiance is very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: The fiance is very happy with this purchase, fits all the parts of the Switch perfectly, and even has room for his 3DS. The bag smelled a little funky though, nothing too awful.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Received a used case
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was broken and taped and there was a piece of potato chip inside the case. The pouch was out of place and there was a used twist tie too. We paid for a new case not for a used one.
customer_reviews.author: Jezabel

customer_reviews.title: Good value. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Teen son loves this. He has several cases but this one has sturdy sections that perfectly fit each piece.
customer_reviews.author: undercover mother

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice case. Has a lot of room for all the switch accessories. Got it for my nephew for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: John Tran

customer_reviews.title: Essential for ALL Switch Owners!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and an essential for ALL Switch owners!! My boyfriend loves this!
customer_reviews.author: KMW

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and perfect size
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this to pack up his switch when spending the night at his grandmother’s. Perfect size to hold everything he needs.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Smells like cigarette and plastic
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had read mshaw's review last May 2017 about the odor issue. I got this Dec 2018 and yes, it still smells. I've left it out to air but one month in, the odor is not going away. Sure, it's functional but I wouldn't want that odor to stick to myself nor my bag when I bring it around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Does what it needs to do
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Does what it needs to do. feels durable. The way the Switch fits in the case makes me a little antsy because its wedged upright and it isn't really very cushioned. Also the cords are a pretty tight fit in there. But it really does do everything it needs to and is convenient for being able to take everything at once. Looks pretty good too.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Great Nintendo Switch case for long hauls!
customer_reviews.text: Used this on a long drive from Alaska to Texas. In eleven days it was opened and closed a lot by three young boys and it still looks great. The case protected my switch and thats all I wanted from it.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Protection
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice case seems to be pretty sturdy .
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Durable
customer_reviews.text: I really like the simplicity of it all. It does not come with a photo on how to organize the things inside, that’s only on the wrapping itself, so keep that in mind. It’s very tough, and I feel like it could be smacked a great amount before it’s even slightly damaged. Overall, very satisfied with the product. Oh! And the zippers have a very red and white lining that was a wonderful surprise
customer_reviews.author: Joey Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Best case!
customer_reviews.text: This is THE carrying case to buy for your switch because it carries everything you need for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne S.

customer_reviews.title: Heck to the yeah
customer_reviews.text: Fits everything, durable, easy to toss HDMI and power cables inside with plenty of room to zip back up.
customer_reviews.author: R.G.

customer_reviews.title: Good case.
customer_reviews.text: Pro controller and regular joycons on joy congrip and two extra joy cons by themselves fit inside the case with some tetrising.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Room enough for the entire system.
customer_reviews.text: This case has been wonderful for vacationing. My son can carry his Switch, controls, charging station and games.
customer_reviews.author: LizWils

customer_reviews.title: Sad it broke so soon
customer_reviews.text: We were happy with this case but the handle broke. It’s only 7 months old. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Mannis-Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Holds everything
customer_reviews.text: This is great. It holds the system, docking station, chords, everything! The sturdy case is good for travel also.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Salsibury

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient. 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to bring my entire switch setup everywhere. It's really easy to carry around and pretty compact for how much it's carrying. One really minor complaint is the HDMI cable and Charger don't always fit in the designated spot, but there's so much extra space in the case that's it makes up for it. Might also just be my fault. I recommend this to every Switch owner
customer_reviews.author: Hemsso Cepeda

customer_reviews.title: Protection for your switch
customer_reviews.text: Its big enough to fit the whole switch and assesories, but also padded and small enough for my 7 year old to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my switch and ALL its accessories. I can take my entire switch setup anywhere I want and just as easily stow it away. The hard casing gives me confidence that my nintendo switch is safe! A little pricey though...
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

product_meta.title: RDS Industries Nintendo Switch System Carrying Case – Protective Deluxe Travel System Case – Black Ballistic Nylon Exterior – Official Nintendo Licensed Product
product_meta.description: Size:System Case| Color:BlackProtect and organize your Nintendo Switch System with this Officially Nintendo Licensed Deluxe Travel System Case. RDS Industries has manufactured this case to Nintendo's stringent and high standards. This Nintendo Switch System Case has a durable hard-shell exterior that protects against accidental drops or knocks. A vacuum formed felt-lined interior holds the system and games securely in place. This case is designed specifically to protect Switch's sensitive analog sticks. Two bonus multi-game cases are included that hold up to 8 games.
feature_bullets: RDS Industries is the #1 Nintendo Licensed accessories manufacturer nationwide. Products are made with superior quality materials.
Exterior: Durable hard-shell case made with Ballistic Nylon or PU Leather, Comfort Grip handle and custom Easy glide zipper.
Interior: Vacuum formed felt-lined interior, holds the complete Nintendo Switch System, can also hold an extra set of Joy-Cons or a Pro Controller.
This case is specially designed to protect the Switch’s Joy-Con Analog Sticks. There is also an added case for power and HDMI cables.
This case is specially designed to protect the Switch’s Joy-Con Analog Sticks. There is also an added case for power and HDMI cables.
Also included: 2 multi-game cases, each case holds 4 games safely and securely. 2 micro SD card cases, each case holds 1 SD card, each SD card case fits into any section of the multi-game case.
